staffDm.confirmSend: If you confirm this, any messages you send here within the next 48 hours will be sent to staff without any confirmation.
staffDm.noConfirmWarn: Any messages you send here within the next 48 hours will be sent to staff without any confirmation.
staffDm.confirmation: Are you sure you want to send this message to staff?
staffDm.dmCancelled: This message will not be sent.
staffDm.resendInfo: If you still want to talk to staff, resend it and click the ✅ button to confirm.

errors.dmError: Sorry, but you can't execute this command in private messages.
errors.noPlayer: 該玩家從未加入過 Hypixel！
errors.notVerified: That user hasn't linked their Hypixel account yet!
errors.noAccess: 你沒有權限執行這個指令！
errors.noPermission: 你沒有權限在本頻道執行這個指令！
errors.apiError: 與 API 聯繫時發生錯誤！

secondLeft: Please wait another second to use `%%command%%` again.
timeLeftT: Please wait another %%time%% seconds to use `%%command%%` again.
minsLeftT: Please wait another %%time%% minutes to use `%%command%%` again.
linkCorrectionDesc: 請你在下次發送連結前將其更改為 %%format%% 格式。
wrongStringURL: 你發送的連結是連接至 Crowdin 在線編輯器而非特定字串本身！
example: 點擊下方圖片顯示的按鈕以取得正確的字串連結。它應該是以下的格式︰%%url%%
reminderLang: 請不要忘記將連結修改為 %%format%% 格式。

tips.ib: Have you tried the Inhale Banana language? Change your language to it using `/language ib`!
tips.translators: I need translators! Find out how to become a bot translator by executing `/translate`.
tips.prefix: Do you wanna have a cool prefix on your nickname? Execute `/prefix` in %%bots%% and follow the instructions! Available to all Hypixel translators.
tips.enen: 請將你發送的連結更改為 en-en！
tips.xp: 你在聊天時，每分鐘都會得到隨機數量的經驗，這會讓你提升等級。
tips.guide: 你知道我們為所有翻譯員提供了 Crowdin 的使用教學嗎？請到 %%gettingStarted%% 查看。那裡有很多有用的提示！
tips.twitter: Have you followed our twitter account? Check it out at %%twitter%%!
tips.rulesInfo: %%rules%% 和 %%serverInfo%% 包含了關於這個伺服器的所有資訊！
tips.fixTranslation: 找到了錯誤的翻譯？請向你的語言的校對員聯絡，或在翻譯頻道提出。
tips.pinnedInfo: 你知道每個頻道都會釘選一些重要資訊嗎？請記得在進入頻道時查看已釘選的訊息！
tips.hypixelStats: You can view information about a specific player on Hypixel by executing `/hypixelstats`!
tips.languageStats: Did you know you can view statistics for any language on all of our projects? Just execute `/languagestats`!
tips.rolesChange: Did you recently get new roles on Crowdin or join one of the projects we support? Execute `/verify` to have your roles updated!
tips.botTranslated: Did you know our bot is available in multiple languages? Try executing `/language list` to see a list of all the languages we currently support and you may just find your own!
tips.moreTips: We need more tips! Submit them using `/feedback`.

pagination.notYours: You cannot interact with this menu! Execute %%command%% yourself to do this.
